mapper.sql: select id, enable, create_by as "createBy", create_time as "createTime", update_by as "updateBy", update_time as "updateTime", remark, sort, name, belonging_community as "belongingCommunity", belonging_home as "belongingHome", address, belonging_unit as "belongingUnit", numbering, avatar, nickname, phone, integral, id_number as "idNumber", is_bind, openid, user_id as "userId",expertise from member
mapper.select: select name,belonging_community as "belongingCommunity",belonging_unit as "belongingUnit" from member where user_id = #{userId}
select ifnull(sum(au.remaining_points),0) as "remainingPoints" from member m LEFT JOIN all_user au ON au.id = m.user_id where m.enable = 1 and m.belonging_community = #{cid}
select ifnull(sum(au.remaining_points),0) as "remainingPoints" from member m LEFT JOIN all_user au ON au.id = m.user_id where m.enable = 1 and m.belonging_unit = #{uid}
